alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Jefferson; Lonoke; Prairie; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 8:42AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Prairie, Lonoke, southeastern Faulkner, north central Jefferson, northeastern Saline and Pulaski Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 841 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Maumelle, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Cabot... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Downtown Little Rock... Lonoke... North Little Rock Airport... Little Rock AFB... Southwest Little Rock... Shannon Hills... England... Carlisle... Wrightsville... Austin in Lonoke County... Argenta... Humnoke... Keo... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Faulkner; Jefferson; Lonoke; Prairie; Pulaski; Saline
